actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the Federal carjacking offense to cases not involving firearms, and to authorize the imposition of the death penalty if a death results from the commission of that offense.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the Federal carjacking offense to cases not involving firearms, and to authorize the imposition of the death penalty if a death results from the commission of that offense.
